title: Provide Information on Voting Locations
description: On election day, a citizen calls the city's information line to find their assigned polling station.

tasks.description: Ask the citizen for their residential address.
Use the address to look up the citizen's assigned polling station in the voter registration database.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system returns the name and address of the correct polling location.

tasks.description: Provide the citizen with the polling station's address and hours of operation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly communicates the requested information.
